page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: Within our 12 square KM.There are 31 recorded working farms,smallholdings and farms no longer used commercially.Tkeworking farms weredivided into arable, mixed, riding stables and kennels.1.There were 8 arable farms with ploughed land providing pasture landand barley,corn , wheat and oats being grown. 2. there were 10 dairy farms ranging in fire fromsmall with 15 beef cattle to large estates with 150 stock animals plus horses ,dogs etc.3.1small holding with 20 sheep and 1 trator.(formerly 100 dairy cows). 4. 3 mixed farms.5. 2 riding stables (10 horses in one,14 in the second .(horses at beachlands are used for riding for disabled children).6.1kenels+ cattery with approximately 10 animals in residence at one time. 7. 6 farms are used only as domestic residences.
